thread.title: Infrastructure, police issues top list of concerns for U.S. mayors
thread.title_full: Infrastructure, police issues top list of concerns for U.S. mayors - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Infrastructure, police issues top list of concerns for U.S. mayors
text: Mental health, mass shootings, infrastructure, and police safety and accountability are among the most pressing issues that need to be addressed by the presidential candidates, according to a nonpartisan group of mayors led by Baltimore's Stephanie Rawlings-Blake. "We aren't asking our candidates... ...
